products.title: Harper Linen Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Harper Linen Roman Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £23.65 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roman Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Harper Range comes in several soft, almost metallic, shades with a light leafy, fern pattern.
 
 Product ID: DB-ROM0946 Fabric Colour: Linen Material: 54% Polyester / 46% Cotton Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining Headrail: Durable White Headrail with Top or Face Fix Brackets.     Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation - Great for a Durable, Even Finish Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Harper Buttercup
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Harper Buttercup Deluxe Roman Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Deluxe Roman Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 300mm Max Width: 1350mm (with join 2500mm)
 	Min Drop: 400mm Max Drop: 2500mm
 	Fabric Composition: 62% Polyester 38% Cotton
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Controls: Sidewinder control.
 	Fabric Lining: Ivory poly cotton lining as standard, white blackout lining and interlining available.
 	Fixings: Fixing brackets included.
 	Headrail: Robust aluminium headrail, 30mm wide x 43mm deep.
 	Finish: Fabric attached to headrail with velcro.
